definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: That is the anchor of the New Era.
sentences.chinese: 那儿就是新纪元的锚定之处。

sentences.english: Practice The invention of machinery had brought into the world a new era --- the Industrial Age.
sentences.chinese: 机器的发明使世界进入了一个新纪元即工业时代。

sentences.english: "Vino Nobile" is the starter series into the world of beverage-specific glasses.
sentences.chinese: “诺柏酒杯”开创了世界上饮料特效杯的新纪元。

sentences.english: Direct access to the full glory of a new era.
sentences.chinese: 直达光辉灿烂的新纪元。

sentences.english: Thus, the new era of Rikulau 953 begins.
sentences.chinese: 也因而展开了953的新纪元。

sentences.english: The water compartment vessel ushered in a new epoch of ocean shipping.
sentences.chinese: 水密隔舱海船开辟了人类远洋航海的新纪元。

sentences.english: We have entered upon a new phase in history.
sentences.chinese: 我们已开始了历史的新纪元。

sentences.english: Really the next day , the Minister, the Minister fell off the horse ahd died .
sentences.chinese: 真的第二天，部长，部长跌下来死马新纪元。

sentences.english: The new age of travel is also sturdily democratic.
sentences.chinese: 旅游的新纪元同时也是十分民主的纪元。

sentences.english: J. h. lambert initiated a new epoch in the theoretical cartography .
sentences.chinese: 兰伯特在理论制图学方面开创了一个新纪元。

sentences.english: It marks the beginning of a new era in human history.
sentences.chinese: 这标志着人类历史新纪元的开始。

sentences.english: The curtain was rung up on a new epoch in world history.
sentences.chinese: 世界历史上一个新纪元的序幕揭开了。

sentences.english: In the New Era the emotional body will settle down.
sentences.chinese: 在新纪元中情绪身体将平静下来。

sentences.english: And this is why also a lot of it became the New Age essentially.
sentences.chinese: 所以本质上成为了新纪元运动。

sentences.english: A new era for Chelsea deserves and demands a new badge.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西的新纪元值得也需要一个新的队徽。

sentences.english: You are the lightworkers, you are the pioneers of a New Era.
sentences.chinese: 你们是光之工作者，你们是新纪元的先锋。

definition: priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
